activities:
In general, you can visit the Site without telling us who you are or revealing any personally identifiable information about yourself. If you choose to register, we will collect your name and  email address. We also will obtain your street mailing address from one or more unaffiliated companies, such as PayPal or credit card providers, that we use for third party payment processing in order for you to fulfill your service subscriptions.  If/when you make a purchase, our third party payment processor will collect your billing address and ask for your PayPal account email or credit card information.  In this Privacy Policy, we refer collectively to your name, email addresses, and postal mailing and billing addresses as your “Personal Information.”  By providing your Personal Information to us or our payment processors, you explicitly agree to our collection and use of such information as described in this Policy. We do not have access to any credit card information you may provide to our payment processors. 
Alternatively, you can log in to our site using sign-in services such as Facebook Connect. These services will authenticate your identity and provide you the option to share certain Personal Information with us, such as your name and email address, to pre-populate our sign-up form.  Services like Facebook Connect may also give you the option to post information about your activities on this Web site to your profile page to share with others within your network.  You are responsible for controlling these settings. 
Generally, we use the information we collect to:
•	Process your registration and create your account
•	Fulfill an order
•	Send you an order confirmation
•	Respond to customer service requests
•	Administer your account
•	Respond to your questions and concerns
•	Improve our Web site and marketing efforts
•	Conduct research and analysis
•	Display content based upon your interests
•	Facilitate your transactions with other users
After signing up for a course, the profile you create will be visible to other course attendees and the course creator.  You may adjust the amount of information visible in your profile from your account settings page.
